title: Ambient Sound on the main menu?
body: Every now and then after an aram, I think I'm getting the ambient sound from the aram map on the main menu and its really loud and annoying, and the only way to turn it off is to mute the client or relog. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: Uhhhhh that's pretty weird tbh! It might be some kind of weird sound delay going on, but that kind of music does play when you enter the queue as well so maybe that's what's going on. Try running a quick client repair if this doesn't stop though!
